    • Constructor Detail

      • AudioHandler

        public AudioHandler(java.lang.String path,
            int startDelay,
            double volume)
        Creates an Audio handler with the specified path and delay.
        Parameters:
        path - - Location of the audio file
        startDelay - - Time in seconds until audio starts
        volume - - Volume of audio 0.0 - 1.0

      • AudioHandler

        public AudioHandler(java.lang.String path,
            int startDelay,
            int duration,
            double volume)
        Creates an Audio handler with the specified path, time and duration
        Parameters:
        path - - Location of the audio file
        startDelay - - Time in seconds until audio starts
        duration - - Time in seconds that the audio will play for
        volume - - Volume of audio 0.0 - 1.0
